name: Deluge: Threnody of Crashing Waves
description: Deluge: Threnody of Crashing Waves is an interactive visual novel. By developing your relationship with the protagonists, the player can unlock that character's endgame. Each endgame can result in a good or bad ending, for a total of 6 different endings. We are planning to release Deluge in early access by the end of 2021. Full release will be in Spring 2022.
